        @NotNull
public Block setBlockPos(@NotNull

        Sets the block position in the world. This is automatically set by {@link Player#lookingAt()}. This method is not meant for public use.

        Parameters:
        blockPos - the block position
        Returns:
        the Block object

      • setFace

        @NotNull
public Block setFace(@NotNull
                              BlockFace face)

        Sets the face that is being looked at by the player. This is automatically set by {@link Player#lookingAt()}. This method is not meant for public use.

        Parameters:
        face - this face that is being looked at
        Returns:
        the Block object
